title: Graphic Designer for E-Commerce Brand (Static Ads & Product Images)
job_overview:
We’re hiring a full-time Graphic Designer to join our e-commerce brand as a dedicated teaUpgrade to see actual infomber — not a freelancer, contractor, or agency. You’ll be working directly with our internal team to create compelling static ads and product images that drive results. We run multiple offers and brands/stores, so you will have variation in your work.

We’ll provide you with ad libraries, swipe files, examples, and templates to help guide your work — but you must already know how to create high-performing static ads. This means being able to take inspiration from competitors and apply those styles to our own products effectively. We’re not here to hand-hold — we need someone who can take initiative and execute confidently.


What You’ll Be Doing:

Designing scroll-stopping static ads for platforms like Facebook, Instagram, etc.

Creating product page images that are clean, professional, and conversion-focused (e.g: lifestyle mockups with AI-generated backgrounds, etc.)

Using AI tools and design software to speed up and enhance your workflow

Maintaining a consistent visual style across creatives

Taking references and examples we provide and producing quality output independently

Communicating clearly and being available during working hours


Requirements:

Strong portfolio with e-commerce product images and static ad creatives

Ability to replicate styles seen in winning competitor ads

Proficient in design tools like Photoshop, Canva, Figma, or similar

Comfortable using AI tools (e.g., Midjourney, ChatGPT, Grok etc.)

Can work fast and independently without constant revisions or direction

High attention to detail, clean layout skills, and an understanding of what looks good on product pages

Must be available during working hours and fully dedicated to our team (we don't want agencies, we don't want to be clients — this is an employee role)
